name: Mirror (itch) (Drealrak)
description:
Weekly Game Jam - Week 148 

Mirror arcade game, the player controlling two characters must finish the different levels by arriving in exit doors

Controls : 

Left Side :

  • Left movement : 
    • A - Left Arrow
  • Right movement :
    • Q - Right Arrow
  • Jump : 
    • Space
  • Pause :
    • P

Right Side :

  • Left movement : 
    • Q - Right Arrow
  • Right movement :
    • A - Left  Arrow
  • Jump : 
    • Space
  • Pause :
    • P
